fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier, generated if not present.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the tool or asset.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the tool or asset.

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL to the tool or resource.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type or media type of the asset.

fields.name: categories
fields.description: Business categories, split from comma-separated list.

fields.name: skillLevel
fields.description: Skill level for the asset, if provided.

fields.name: tabs
fields.description: Array of tab names or categories associated with the asset.

fields.name: date_created
fields.description: ISO date string for when the asset was created.

fields.name: date_modified
fields.description: ISO date string for when the asset was last modified.

fields.name: created_by
fields.description: Identifier or name of the user who created the asset.
